item.title: About me
item.author: info@nandotech.com (Fernando Rodriguez)
item.description: My name is Fernando Rodriguez. I am the Founder & CEO of NandoTech Inc, where we specialize in customized software development work for businesses of all shapes and sizes. Beyond custom and software development work, we have also developed a fairly strong portfolio of VoIP customers ranging from small office phone systems to large-scale call center capablities. I have an deep love for Clean Code and strive for many of the same principles applied by giants who started long before us.
